title: Israeli firm launches circulation-stimulating smart socks
text:
Israeli firm launches circulation-stimulating smart socks 3:21am EDT - 01:32 
Smart socks that provide continual treatment for those suffering from poor circulation in their legs have been created by an Israeli start-up. Elly Park   
Smart socks that provide continual treatment for those suffering from poor circulation in their legs have been created by an Israeli start-up. Elly Park  //reut.rs/2pIi4BA
